Description: Mummified ibis; linen wrappings arranged in diamond-pattern; patch of resin.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1977 London, BM, Animals in Art 1986 Jun-Oct, Carmarthen Museum, A son of Luxor's Sands 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story 2013 27 Apr-4 Nov , Singapore, Art Science Museum, Mummy the Inside Story. 2016, 19 May-27 Nov, London, BM, Sunken Treasures
